summary: Provides a wrapper around the argcomplete library to enhance Bash command-line completion for the Ansible test CLI, including utilities for interpreting COMP_TYPE values, delivering option suggestions with proper quoting and validation, and offering a fallback placeholder when the full functionality is unavailable.
business_intent: To deliver reliable and user‑friendly auto‑completion for Ansible test command‑line tools, handling edge cases and environment differences while maintaining compatibility with Bash completion mechanisms.
